Package moblima.UI

Class StaffUI

java.lang.Object
moblima.UI.StaffUI
public class StaffUI extends Object
Handles all user IO for current Staff

      managerList - List of Managers.

  • Method Details

    • addNewMovie

      public void addNewMovie() throws InvalidInputException
      Gets user input and adds new Movie to MovieManager movieList.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException

    • getAllMovieDetails

      public void getAllMovieDetails()
      Retrieves movieList from MovieManager and displays all movie details.

    • removeMovie

      public void removeMovie() throws InvalidInputException
      Gets user input for movie title to be removed and removes it from MovieManager's movieList.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException

    • updateCineplexMovies

      public void updateCineplexMovies() throws InvalidInputException
      Gets user input to assign a Movie to a Cineplex.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException

    • getAllSessions

      public void getAllSessions()
      Retrieves all Sessions from CinemaManager and displays them.

    • getAllBookings

      public void getAllBookings()
      Retrieves all Bookings from BookingManager and displays them.

    • viewMoviesByRating

      public void viewMoviesByRating()
      Displays a list of movies sorted by a movie's average rating. Higher rating indicates higher rank and thus will be displayed first.

    • viewMoviesBySales

      public void viewMoviesBySales()
      Displays a list of movies sorted by a movie's number of sales. Higher number of sales indicates higher rank and thus will be displayed first.

    • configurePriceOfTickets

      public void configurePriceOfTickets()
      Allows staff to change the price of the tickets of different Day Types or Customer Status Type. If no existing predefined price for a new category, the new criteria is added. For example, if staff wants to add "DAY_A" with priceProportion of 8, but currently there's no "DAY_A" day type, it will be added. If "DAY_A" already exists, then the priceProportion corresponding to "DAY_A" will be updated.

    • configureCustomerVisibility

      public void configureCustomerVisibility()
      Allows Staff to change the visibility of customer when viewing movies by a filter.

    • updateMovieDetails

      public void updateMovieDetails(int ID) throws InvalidInputException
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException

    • init

      public void init()
      Initialises StaffUI. Displays user's options and calls relevent methods.
